info.author: UNKNOWN
info.description:
Introduction
============

Products.highlighter is a Plone plugin that enables end users to highlight
content in a Plone site, and share comments about highighted text with each
other either directly on a highlighter enabled Plone site, or via common
social networking sites.

This product is a joint project between enPraxis (http://enpraxis.net) and
Highlighter (http://highlighter.com)

Once installed and enabled, A highlighter icon will appear in the upper right
of your Plone site. Text and images can now be annotated and shared by
selecting and right clicking.

Enabling and disabling as well as analytics and highlighter account management 
can all be done through the Highlighter control panel.

You can create a highlighter account and connect it to your Plone site
withouth having to browse directly to the highlighter web site.

Changelog
=========

1.0
-------------------

- Initial release
info.name: Products.highlighter
info.summary: Highlight text in your plone site and see what others are highlighting as well.
